Make a copy of your sheet : $NewSheet=$TemplateSheet->copy()
Change the title : $NewSheet->setTitle('Dont Exists in Workbook')
Add the sheet : $objPHPExcel->addSheet($NewSheet)

Perhaps broken in 1.7.9 (see topic "How to duplicate a Sheet")
